I am a designer and developer studying Computer Science and Design at Northwestern University.

My strengths lie in bringing digital products to life, overseeing the research, design and development. I have experience delivering functional products to real-world clients.
 I am currently focusing on becoming a better full-stack developer and product designer.
 In my free time I read, write and travel. You can find my code on Github, photography on Behance, and professional journey on LinkedIn.

My work (newest first)

 a freelance branding, design and website development project for a counseling startup

Mynd
 an online diary for emotion management designed as a mobile web app

Multisensory VR experience

Intuit + Northwestern
